title: Bypass Windows Proxy
author: matthiasballreich
body_snippet:
Is there an option to bypass the configured windows proxy when connecting to some servers? 

If not a option for this would be very helpful, because on my system of the organisation we use a local proxy for the whole traffic, which blocks these connections, so it would be good to bypass the proxy if it is activated under the windows settings.

comments.snippet: so far its not implemented but perhaps will add as an option for such
comments.author: Kvarkas

comments.snippet: That would be good to have such an option. I wonder why this has not been reported earlier :)
